attributes.additional_details:
The Trafford centre in Manchester has a car park and road system that is not fit for capacity. Local residents are cut off from the motorway and the traffic can strand you for hours at a time.

The Trafford centre has increased in size over the last 10 years and road system is not capable of handling the volume of visitors. They have recently added a convention centre which has greatly increased the issue of traffic problems.

The Trafford centre should not be allowed to further expand unless they improve the road system surrounding it - This petition is cap further development until a suitable traffic calming measure is developed and put into place.
